attributes.action: Promote an enterprise culture by cutting taxes, reducing Government, scrapping the so called initiatives and letting people choose how to spend their money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have a top heavy Government system that smothers real enterprise, a hugely complex tax system that penalises growth, a legal system that has become so unwieldly that employers will go overseas, and a growing culture of "they should fix this....." rather than "I want to fix this....."
